text: Addrup is a village in Cloppenburg, in Lower Saxony, Germany. ==Geography== Addrup borders the villages of Gut Lage, Uptloh, Bevern, Calhorn and Stadtsholte within the Essen (Oldenburg) municipality. To the east, Addrup borders Lüsche in Bakum in Vechta. Being on the border of the districts of Cloppenburg and Vechta, Addrup is in the center of the Oldenburg Münsterland.Addrup.de: Homepage ==References== ==Other websites== *Website of Addrup * Category:Villages in Lower Saxony Category:Cloppenburg (district)
title: Addrup
